Faz o login e garante que não há carrinhos ativos para o usuário.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Numbers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to real numbers.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.msg: ${json_body} = {'message': 'Token de acesso ausente, inválido, expirado ou usuário do token não existe mais'}
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
Dictionary Should Contain Key
kw.doc: Fails if ``key`` is not found from ``dictionary``.
Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Get From Dictionary
kw.msg: ${actual_message} = Token de acesso ausente, inválido, expirado ou usuário do token não existe mais
kw.doc: Returns a value from the given ``dictionary`` based on the given ``key``.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Dictionary Should Contain Value
kw.doc: Fails if ``value`` is not found from ``dictionary``.

suite.doc: Testes de API para o endpoint /carrinhos
